Title: Reimagine Finance with AI and Agents | BRK354
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Finance processes are ripe for transformation with AI and agents, allowing business leaders to minimize liability, improve financial insights, and reduce overtime and tedious work for finance teams. Join us to learn about the Frontier Firm's Finance tech stack and build your own plan for transformation.

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction to frontier firms and AI-first finance strategies 00:03:35 - Microsoft tools supporting finance transformation including Azure AI Foundry and Copilot Studio 00:09:01 - Finance-specific Copilot features in Outlook and Excel integrating ERP data and automating reconciliation tasks 00:12:03 - Copilot assists in troubleshooting mismatched transactions 00:16:40 - Automating variance analysis through AI actions 00:23:40 - Handling Larger Voucher Mismatch and Automating Journal Entry Creation 00:27:00 - Emphasis on Human Oversight, Auditability, and Financial Control 00:33:25 - Introduction to Copilot Studio for Custom Financial Agents 00:35:08 - Simplifying Agent Creation Without Coding Expertise
